data.name: Re-thinking The Sales Funnel: B2B selling during uncertain times
data.summary:
What will be discussed:

The sales funnel today - what it looks like and how has it changed.
Effective B2B sales during uncertain times.
How effective are traditional sales methods today, specifically remote selling
Sales technology and how it has influenced the sales cycle
data.speakers:
Mike Paladino, Head of Sales, PandaDoc
Bryan Elesser, Senior Director, Sales Development, Aircall
Francois Grenier, Head of Product Partnerships, Typeform
Karthik Rajaram, Head of Global Sales Development, Freshworks
Robert Kelly, Chairman, Sales Management Association
